description:
Warrior of the Rabbit, Usagi, is a Necromantist, who makes other warriors into his "friends." Warrior of the Ox, Ushii, and Warrior of the Tiger, Tora, end up facing off against two of these "friends," the Tatsumi Brothers. As they prepare for the battle, Tora, who holds a grudge against Ushii, thinks back to her days spent searching for righteousness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Nito Ou Mono wa Itto mo Ezu
Qui court deux lièvres n’en prend aucun
The Man Who Chases Two Rabbits Catches Neither
二兎追う者は一兎も得ず
두 마리 토끼를 쫓으면 하나도 못 잡는다
